timeline.body:
The factory methods in this class are overly crowded.
I think we can introduce a builder class that builds a `CircuitBreakerMapping` fluently.
For example:
```java
CircuitBreakerMapping mapping = 
    CircuitBreakerMapping.builder()
                         .perMethod()
                         .perPath()
                         ...
                        .build()

CircuitBreakerClient.newDecorator(mapping, rule);
```
